Html:
Hi RadioMan :)

I found it awesome checking the demo (windows form) application. Actually I am starting to develop a windows CE application using Google map offline data (gathered separately). I am wondering if I can use the original Google map cache or Gmap.NET has its own format for caching tiles?

If not, is there any simple way to convert Google cache to GMap cache?

cheers mate
google maps has it's own format, i think it's simpler just to prefetch the area manually in demos

well, prefetch feature is very helpful anyway :)

thank you
